description: Query AWS DynamoDB databases using natural language requests. Access and manage your DynamoDB data effortlessly through a user-friendly interface. Simplify your data interactions and enhance your LLM capabilities with seamless integration.

capabilities.name: list-tables
capabilities.description: Get a list of all DynamoDB tables

capabilities.name: describe-table
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a DynamoDB table

capabilities.name: scan-table
capabilities.description: Scan items from a DynamoDB table

capabilities.name: query-table
capabilities.description: Query items from a DynamoDB table based on conditions

capabilities.name: get-item
capabilities.description: Get an item from a DynamoDB table based on a specific key

capabilities.name: count-items
capabilities.description: Count items in a DynamoDB table
